data.name: Geometric Sniper - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
DISCOVER OTHER GAMES FROM THIS STUDIO:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1426980/Hidden_Memory__Nature/


About the Game

Incredible arts specially designed to convey the atmosphere of the game, leaving your computer's desktop with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Geometric Sniper” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\Geometric Sniper\Geometric_Sniper-Wallpapers).
